page.title: 04Golspie-local newspaper.
page.content: We asked our local newspaper about production methods,local infomation gathering and circulation. {The Northern Times uses modern {photo-setting equipment for setting up {the paper and print the newspaper on a {flat bed preferring this slower method {as it can also be used for a whole {variety of other types of printing. {Local information is gathered from all {over Sutherland,which has an area of {over two thousand square miles,by {local unpaid correspondents in all the {different communities. {The paper has grown in circulation {from the time it was first printed in {1899,from about 200 copies then to {today where it is read in every {household in Sutherland and is read as {far away as Australia,Nepal and {Ceylon. }
